unifiedImport.notification.error.noMetho: Your content could not be imported
No suitable import method found for the selected content. Please check the file format and try again.
unifiedImport.notification.error.invalid: Your content could not be imported
The import method was unavailable. Contact your administrator for support.
unifiedImport.notification.error.content: Your content could not be imported
The selected content was disapproved by the import method.
unifiedImport.notification.success.proce: Your import {0} has been initiated. You will be soon notified about its completion.
unifiedImport.notification.error.timeout: Your content could not be uploaded
The connection to the upload server might have timed out.
Verify your connection or reduce the amount of data being submitted during this operation.
unifiedImport.notification.error.checkin: Your content could not be uploaded
unifiedImport.notification.error.network: Wait a few minutes and try again.
unifiedImport.notification.error.maxFile: Your content could not be imported
The maximum allowed content size is 1GB.
unifiedImport.notification.error.driveIm: Drag and drop outside the local directory is not allowed.
unifiedImport.notification.error.maxNoOf: Your content could not be imported because the import method only allows a maximum of {0} files.
unifiedImport.notification.info.contentU: Your content was uploaded. Click on Import to begin.
unifiedImport.content.grid.tooltip.group: The file is excluded either because some corresponding content is missing or because it is redundant for the import method.
unifiedImport.content.grid.tooltip.Witho: The file is excluded because it is either redundant or not supported for this import.
unifiedImport.content.grid.tooltip.maxFi: The file is excluded because the import method only allows a maximum file size of {0}.
unifiedImport.content.grid.tooltip.inval: The file is excluded because it is not compatible with the import method.
unifiedImport.content.grid.tooltip.maxFi: The file is excluded because the import method only allows file names with a maximum length of {0} characters.
